attributes.action: make causing a death during the commission of any crime an act of murder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The idea behind this is that it would enable the courts to hand down more realistic sentences for crimes that, at this time, carry what many would regard as inadequate punishments. It could be something like the American "degrees of murder" idea.

This would include, amongst others, the drunk drivers who kill someone whilst over the drinks limit.
